title: Toster
body:
Welcome, where you are going?
[[We're trying to escape out of this house|Toster1]]
[[we are looking for plastic household devices, are you coming with us?|Toster2]]

title: Toster1
body:
<<switch DialoguePopup 1>>
You cannot do this, you are the Homeowners' property
[[It's easy for you to say. You're made out of steel. You do not pollute the environment|Toster11]]
[[You're right, but we're outdated. They will get rid of us rather sooner than later|Toster12]]

title: Toster2
body:
No, I'm made of steel
So what are you going to do?
[[we're going to run away from home|Toster21]]

title: Toster11
body:
It does not change anything, and you will stay here
None of us should leave this house
Not of our own will
<<close DialoguePopup 1>>

title: Toster21
body:
<<switch DialoguePopup 1>>
You must stay at home
I can not let you get out of here!
<<close DialoguePopup 1>>
